description.value:
You take on the imposing form of a large, winged spirit. Once per day, as part of using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Long-Nosed Form], you also gain the benefits of 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enlarge] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fly]. This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Great Tengu Form]
